name: Mission Asteroid (itch)
description:
The Mission:

  • You must manoeuvre around asteroids - don't get hit, do you have what it takes to complete the mission?
  • Your ship has only 5 cores, smash the white gems to repower them.
  •  Ensure to always keep your ships cores energized by continuously moving - don't stop stationary for more than 4 seconds.
  • Find Dave I guess, that's what it said in the prologue thingy, right?  Though I haven't really, cough implemented an 'end' to the game, cough cough.

Controls:

  • Use the mouse to dodge the incoming rocks of fire.
  • To pause, press the esc key located on your keyboard.

Note: This is my first published game. Also, I think it may be a bit too hard.

Another Note: You may be wondering, "how are the so called 'asteroids' set a blaze - there is no oxygen in space, and aren't they called meteors?" Your delusional,  shu-shut it!

A Different Note: I was too lazy to make a settings menu, sorry please forgive me.

For Game Jam 2021 AD $420.
